name: Seven Spiced Shark Steaks
author: mcomijohns
summary: Try this recipe for spicy, tangy, and delicious shark!
directions: Rinse the shark steaks and trim off any skin
Mix together the soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, onion powder, garlic salt, thyme, black pepper, and chili powder in a small bowl to form a paste
Spread a thin layer of the soy sauce mixture on both sides of each shark steak
Place on a plate and cover
Allow to marinate in the refrigerator at least 30 minutes
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Arrange the shark on a baking sheet
Bake the shark in the preheated oven until cooked completely through, about 40 minutes, turning the steaks over once, about half-way through the cooking time
